name: Wave Jam , UNDER THE WAVES
description:
hello

controls (Space) for jump (WASD) for movement, (F)  shoot

Do not be greedy =)

and 

you can shoot yourself 

The goal of my game is to get to the end and defeat the boss and all his minions before they kill you. also the

the Black Rocks do 20 HP damage

the Orange Rocks do 10 HP damage 

the Enemy do 10 up to 20 HP damage

The Cthulhu boss does 50 HP Damage
